post.text: The FBI is actively and aggressively pursuing and investigating the Clinton Foundation's alleged "Pay to Play."

replies.author: Eric
replies.text: Not sure what's more amazing....that she 's still trying to lie her way through all this and has not yet stepped down and removed herself from the presidential race OR the people who STILL support her and still plan to vote for her on Tuesday??

replies.author: Brianna
replies.text: Yes....I am baffled by both. What baffles me the most is that she is still legally able to run! I just don't know what it takes to be disqualified from running for the leadership of this country! Kind of sickening if you ask me!
